options: A day for students to have music classes.
A day for parents to meet their children's teachers at school.
A day for teachers to get presents from their students.
A day for students to decorate their classrooms.
questions: What's the date of Mother's Day?
article:
?Allen!
5/7 Monday
I'm busy this week. The following Sunday is Mother's Day and there are many activities at school. One of them is PTA Day. It's on Friday. Mum and Dad are both coming. I'm a little nervous  . What will Mr. Chang tell them?
5/8 Tuesday
Mr. Wu is our new music teacher. He teaches us Mother, a beautiful song about our love for mothers.
5/9 Wednesday
We practice Mother today. This is the special present for our parents on Friday.
5/10 Thursday
It takes us two hours to decorate  our classroom for PTA Day. I'm tired. Mum is nervous. It's  the first time for her to meet our teachers. She is always nervous about talking to teachers from her childhood . That's funny.
